summary: Provides an asynchronous workflow that uses an LLM (via OpenAI) and LangSmith tracing to assign incoming user questions to a fixed set of categories defined by an enumeration, employing Pydantic models for structured output.
business_intent: Automate the routing of user inquiries by categorizing them, enabling downstream services to handle specific request types such as contact lookup, timeline queries, document searches, or summarizations, while maintaining observability through LangSmith.
